param.name: tr
param.label: Set the ouput file resolution
param.help: -tr xres yres. Set output file resolution (in target georeferenced units)

param.name: b
param.label: Select an input band band for output
param.help: eg : -b band -b 1 -b 2 -b 3. Bands are numbered from 1. Multiple -b switches may be used to select a set of input bands to write to the output file, or to reorder bands.

param.name: tap
param.label: Align the coordinates
param.help: -tap Target Aligned Pixel, align the coordinates of the extent of the output file to the values of the -tr, such that the aligned extent includes the minimum extent

param.name: separate
param.label: Place each input file into a separate band
param.help: -separate. In that case, only the first band of each dataset will be placed into a new band. Contrary to the default mode, it is not required that all bands have the same datatype

param.name: a_srs
param.label: Override the projection for the output file
param.help: -a_srs srs_def. The srs_def may be any of the usual GDAL/OGR forms, complete WKT, PROJ.4, EPSG:n or a file containing the WKT. No reprojection is done

param.name: stats
param.label: Force (re)computation of statistics
param.help: -stats. Read and display image statistics. Force computation if no statistics are sto.red in an image.

param.name: norat
param.help: -norat. Do not copy source RAT into destination dataset.
param.label: Suppress printing of raster attribute table.

param.name: of
param.label: Output format -of
param.help: Select the output format. The default is GeoTIFF (GTiff). A short list of raster formats is currently enable in GalaxyE : GTiff, netCDF and VRT.

param.name: co
param.label: Pass a creation option to the output format driver

param.name: ot
param.label: Datatype of the output bands
param.option: Select a datatype for the output bands (default)

param.name: input
param.help: Formats currently supported are : GTiff, netCDF and VRT
param.label: Gdal supported input file
